sn37.14:1.1: “Pancahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannagato matugamo …pe… nirayam upapajjati.
sn37.14:1.3: Panatipati ca hoti, adinnadayi ca hoti, kamesumicchacari ca hoti, musavadi ca hoti, suramerayamajjappamadatthayi ca hoti—
sn37.14:1.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pancahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati”ti.
